H0.text: what type of government did thomas jefferson prefer. Liberal Democracy

H1.text: what type of government did thomas jefferson prefer. Constitutional Republic

H2.text: what type of government did thomas jefferson prefer. Federalism

H3.text: what type of government did thomas jefferson prefer. Unitarianism

A4.text: He supported public education and a free press as essential components of a democratic nation.

A5.text: He tried to restore a balance between the state and federal governments more nearly reflecting the Articles of Confederation, seeking to reinforce state prerogatives where his party was in the majority.
